ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... and ... I second that!  By the way, one more time for the record.  Where can I fight at lvl 15,get good loot and not die?  I m so poor, I have yet to buy
ygData.messageBody:
> Message to all the Players over 30th level who have over a 1000p in bank
and
> nothing to spend it on:
>
> I am not Proud

I second that! By the way, one more time for the record. Where can I fight
at lvl 15,get good loot and not die? I'm so poor, I have yet to buy my lvl
11, 14, and 15 songs. I am so poor that in order to make extra cash to
build up my smithing skill, I fish. On the other hand, my fishing is 50
now. How you measure fishing skill I don't know, but I am AVERAGE in
fishing!

Weiland of FREEPORT
EROLLISI MARR
always on at around 10 pm CST (hint, hint)
will respond to any tells and come running to grovel for donations when
offered (another hint)
I do not mind being handed cash or sellable items but I won't use a given
item (unless its really nice, i.e. troll hide belt, blackened iron crown)
unless I've done something for it. (big hint)
